name: TestWebSocketApiRequestHandler
description: Unit tests for the WebSocketApiRequestHandler class, focusing on exception handling and mandatory parameter checks.

test_cases.name: testRequestWithoutWebSocketConnection
test_cases.description: Tests the constructor of WebSocketApiRequestHandler when no WebSocket connection is provided, expecting a BinanceConnectorException.

test_cases.name: testPublicRequestWithoutMandatoryParams
test_cases.description: Tests the publicRequest method of WebSocketApiRequestHandler when mandatory parameters are missing, expecting a BinanceConnectorException.

test_cases.name: testApiRequestWithoutMandatoryParams
test_cases.description: Tests the apiRequest method of WebSocketApiRequestHandler when mandatory parameters are missing or when the API key is null, expecting a BinanceConnectorException.

test_cases.name: testSignedRequestWithoutMandatoryParams
test_cases.description: Tests the signedRequest method of WebSocketApiRequestHandler when mandatory parameters are missing or when the API key or signature generator is null, expecting a BinanceConnectorException.

test_cases.name: testRequestWithInvalidRequestId
test_cases.description: Tests the publicRequest method of WebSocketApiRequestHandler when an invalid request ID is provided, expecting a BinanceConnectorException.
